short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take UpGuard with you and see the security rating for every website you visit.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
UpGuardâ€™s free Cyber Security Ratings (CSR) extension helps you keep safe on the Internet. The extension automatically retrieves the security rating for any site you visit, providing an assessment of a company's risk potential based on their security posture and behaviors in a single, numeric score.

With one click you can view the full report of factors that contributed to the score, and assess your risks when browsing on the site.
